description: Check that your vehicle meets the required emissions standards

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Find out if your vehicle meets the current emissions standards required for the Ultra Low Emission Zone (ULEZ) and/or the Low Emission Zone (LEZ) or if you need to pay a daily charge."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

{"template":"bulletlist","items":[" \u003ca href=\"/modes/driving/ultra-low-emission-zone\"\u003eULEZ\u003c/a\u003e : covers all vehicles driven within the central London area"," \u003ca href=\"/modes/driving/low-emission-zone\"\u003eLEZ\u003c/a\u003e : covers HGVs, lorries, vans, buses, coaches, minibuses and other specialist diesel vehicles driven within Greater London"]}

The ULEZ operates every day of the year except Christmas Day (25 December) and the LEZ operates every day of the year - charging days run from midnight to midnight. You might also need to pay the Congestion Charge .
This checker doesn't reflect changes we're making to LEZ standards in 2020 .
Be careful not to mix up the letters 'I ' and 'O ' with the numbers '1 ' and '0 '.
Choose the correct country of registration. You risk getting a penalty if you pick the wrong one.
Daily charge: £200
Why: The vehicle’s details as registered with us show it doesn’t meet the required LEZ standards OR it's registered outside the UK and we don't hold any details for it.
The LEZ is different from the ULEZ - it doesn't apply to cars and motorbikes.

If you believe your vehicle does meet the required standards, register it with us . Until we confirm your vehicle is registered you need to pay the £200 daily LEZ charge if you drive it within the zone.
Daily charge: £100
Why: The vehicle's details as registered with us show it doesn't meet the required LEZ standards.
The LEZ is different from the ULEZ - it doesn't apply to cars and motorbikes.
If you believe your vehicle does meet the required standards, register it with us . Until we confirm your vehicle is registered you need to pay the daily LEZ charge if you drive it within the zone.

The LEZ is different from the ULEZ - it doesn't apply to cars and motorbikes. This vehicle either meets the required emission standards, is exempt from or not affected by the scheme, or is subject to a 100% discount.
Daily charge: £12.50
Why: This could be because the vehicle’s details as registered with us show it doesn’t meet the required ULEZ standards OR it's registered outside the UK and we don't hold any details for it.
If you believe your vehicle meets the standards, you will need to register it with us.
How you register your vehicle will depend on its country of registration:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":[" \u003ca href=\"https://www.epcplc.com/ulez/login\"\u003eNon-UK registered vehicles must be registered through our partner, EPCplc.\u003c/a\u003e You will be taken to their website"," \u003ca href=\"/modes/driving/compliance-registration/before-you-start\"\u003eUK-registered vehicles can be registered directly with us\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Until we confirm that your vehicle meets the emissions standards, you need to pay the daily ULEZ charge whenever you drive within the zone.
The checker ONLY checks the emissions standard of the vehicle. To check if a discount or exemption applies to your vehicle - and whether you need to pay the charge - go to Pay to drive in London .
Daily charge: £100
Why: The vehicle's details as registered with us show it doesn't meet the required ULEZ standards.
If you believe your vehicle meets the standards, you will need to register it with us.
How you register your vehicle will depend on its country of registration:

{"template":"bulletlist","items":[" \u003ca href=\"https://www.epcplc.com/ulez/login\"\u003eNon-UK registered vehicles must be registered through our partner, EPCplc.\u003c/a\u003e You will be taken to their website"," \u003ca href=\"/modes/driving/compliance-registration/before-you-start\"\u003eUK-registered vehicles can be registered directly with us\u003c/a\u003e "]}
Until we confirm that your vehicle meets the emissions standards, you need to pay the daily ULEZ charge whenever you drive within the zone.
The checker ONLY checks the emissions standard of the vehicle. To check if a discount or exemption applies to your vehicle - and whether you need to pay the charge - go to Pay to drive in London .
This vehicle meets the emission standards for ULEZ so you don't have to pay this charge when driving within the zone.
Double check that the vehicle details have been typed correctly. You risk getting a penalty if you've identified the wrong vehicle.
Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, this vehicle is exempt from the ULEZ.
This may change - always check to see if you need to pay to drive within the zone.
Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, you don't have to pay the ULEZ charge for this vehicle.
This may change - always check to see if you need to pay to drive within the zone.
A 100% ULEZ discount applies to this vehicle. You don't have to pay the charge to drive within the zone.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Check your zone"}
If you're not sure where the zones are, use our ULEZ zone map and LEZ zone map to check if you're driving into or within any of the zones.
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Options"}
If you're thinking of buying a new or second-hand car, look up its emissions in real-world driving conditions on the Mayor's Cleaner Vehicle Checker .
